title: Digital Twin Web
detailedDescription:
### openPlatform Digital Twin Demo

============================

**Requirements:**

- Download the application DIGITAL TWIN SENSEHAT of the Market and follow the steps. 

**How to use:**

1. Put the URL of this proyect in a Web Navigator
2. Select the DigitalTwin that you want to use and click on 'Connect'

You will show the shadow of the sensehat in real time (temperature, humidity and pressure). If you push the joystick of the SenseHat device to the left you will show on the DigitalTwin representation a drawn arrow to the left. If you click on the button 'R' of the joystick on the DigitalTwin representation you will show a drawn arrow on the SenseHat device.
